availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gabriel Caldwell Wharton (Springfield, Washington County, Kentucky, lawyer and soldier U.S.A.)

body.p: Springfield, Washington County, Kentucky, lawyer and soldier. Springfield, Kentucky native. Son of John Wharton and Sarah Caldwell Wharton. Attended the University of Louisville department of law in 1856. Lawyer in Springfield, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 10th Kentucky infantry (U.S.A.) as a Major. Promoted to lieutenant colonel on March 11, 1863. Mustered out on December 7, 1864 in Louisville, Kentucky.
